name: Ball Wander
description:
"Ball Wander" is a basic map exploration game made using the Unity Game Engine and is written in C#. There are no objectives, there is one collectable, it IS possible to fall out of the map. The joy of Ball Wander is simply jumping and rolling around the map, enjoying yourself and the bizarrely calming scenery that the game provides.

**if you fall out of the map and want to restart the level, just press E
